title: Worlds and team icon.

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body: so its saying icons and emotes will still be available after 10/8 yet i look at the store today and theyre not there anymore? I think you guys need to do a better job either wording or explaining.

replies.body:
Those bundles are gone now, but you'll be able to buy the emotes and icons that were in the bundles once patch 7.20 drops. That wording isn't wrong perse, it just didn't comment on the fact that they wouldn't be around for a couple days.

Once the patch drops, be sure to check the store for those items!

Will the icon by itself be cheaper than the bundle was? I didn't really care for the emote so I decided not to buy the bundle for the increased price but it might be worth getting if it's not, you know, five dollars worth of points.
